inputs.name: Timeframe
inputs.validation: Must be one of: Last 24 hours, 7 days, 30 days, All
inputs.help_text: Specify the timeframe for displayed information.

inputs.name: Refresh Interval
inputs.validation: Must be one of: Disabled, 5 minutes, 10 minutes, 30 minutes, 60 minutes
inputs.help_text: Set the refresh interval for updating charts.

inputs.name: Select List of Charts
inputs.help_text: Choose which charts to display on the dashboard.

inputs.name: Charts Per Row
inputs.help_text: Set the number of charts displayed per row.

inputs.name: Profiler Selection
inputs.validation: Must be one of: All Profilers or specific profiler names
inputs.help_text: Choose the profiler for which information is displayed.

actions.description: Download the dashboard charts as a PDF report.
Schedule email notifications for dashboard reports.

constraints: Dashboard refresh interval must be set to a valid value (Disabled, 5 minutes, 10 minutes, 30 minutes, 60 minutes).
Charts per row must be between 1 and 3.
Profiler selection must be valid (All Profilers or specific profiler names).
Timeframe must be one of: Last 24 hours, 7 days, 30 days, All.

errors.trigger: User selects a timeframe not listed in the dropdown.
User selects a refresh interval not listed in the dropdown.

states: Devices for which the profile has changed

workflows.name: Dashboard Report Workflow
steps: Navigate to Profiler -> Dashboard and Report -> Dashboard.
Customize dashboard settings (timeframe, refresh interval, charts per row, etc.).
Download report as PDF or schedule email notifications.
prerequisites: Profiler must be configured and profiling must be active.
